about: Create a user story for the product backlog
title: "[User Story] "
labels: enhancement
assignees: ''

---

### User Story

As a **[type of user]**, I need **[some feature]** so that **[some benefit]**.

---

### Acceptance Criteria

```gherkin
Given [initial condition],
When [event occurs],
Then [expected outcome].
